overview: DVD 1 - Garorock Show (93 min, Marmande, 4 April 2009): 1. Oroborus 2. The Heaviest Matter of the Universe 3. Backbone 4. Love 5. From the Sky 6. A Sight to Behold 7. The Art of Dying 8. Drum Solo 9. Clone 10. Flying Whales 11. The Way of All Flesh 12. Terra Incognita 13. Vacuity  Les Vieilles Charrues Show (15 min, Carhaix, 17 July 2010): 1. Indians 2. Toxic Garbage Island 3. World to Come  DVD 2 - Bordeaux (80 min, Rock School Barbey, 9 February 2009): 1. Oroborus 2. The Heaviest Matter of the Universe 3. Backbone 4. Love 5. From the Sky 6. A Sight to Behold 7. The Art of Dying 8. Drum Solo 9. Clone 10. Flying Whales 11. The Way of All Flesh 12. Terra Incognita 13. Vacuity  Documentary: The Way of All Flesh Inside (62 min)
title: Gojira: The Flesh Alive
